words.def: people who have severe visual impairments, considered as a group
something that hinders as if with bonds
One of the small bones in the knee joints of sheep uniting the bones above and below the joints.
an authoritative direction or instruction to do something
the writing point of a pen
a loud harsh or strident noise
either of two folds of skin that can be moved to cover or open the eye
United States sculptor and architect whose public works include the memorial to veterans of the Vietnam War in Washington (born in 1959)
a heavy brittle diamagnetic trivalent metallic element (resembles arsenic and antimony chemically)
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
